casebody.data:
Crystal WHICKER, Employee
v.
COMPASS GROUP USA, INC./Crothall Services Group, Employer, Self-insured (Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Administrator); and Novant Health, Inc., Alleged Joint Employer, Self-insured No. 172P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Michael F. Roessler, Attorney at Law, for Whicker, Crystal. Angela Farag Craddock, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Compass Group USA, Inc., et al. Jeffrey T. Linder, Attorney at Law, Raleigh. Barbara E. Ruark, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Novant Health, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of May 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
